content:
EntityDataSourceDesigner Class

In this Article

Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the EntityDataSource control.

Syntax

Declaration

public class EntityDataSourceDesigner : System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ComponentDesigner
  • HtmlControlDesigner
  • ControlDesigner
  • System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner
  • EntityDataSourceDesigner

Constructors summary

EntityDataSourceDesigner()

Creates a new instance of the EntityDataSourceDesigner.

Properties summary

CanConfigure

Gets a value that indicates whether the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure* method can be called by the design host.
CanRefreshSchema

Gets a value that indicates whether the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema* method can be called by the design host.
CommandText

Gets or sets the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.CommandText* property of the EntityDataSource control.
ConnectionString

Gets or sets the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString* property of the EntityDataSource control.
DefaultContainerName

Gets or sets the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.DefaultContainerName* property of the EntityDataSource control.
EntitySetName

Gets or sets the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName* property of the EntityDataSource control.
EntityTypeFilter

Gets or sets the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter* property of the EntityDataSource control.
OrderBy

Gets or sets the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.OrderBy* property of the EntityDataSource control.
Select

Gets or sets the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Select* property of the EntityDataSource control.
Where

Gets or sets the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.Where* property of the EntityDataSource control.

Methods summary

Configure()

Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.
GetView(String)

Returns a data source view that has the specified name.
GetViewNames()

Gets a list of available views.
Initialize(IComponent)

Initializes the control designer and loads the specified component.
PreFilterProperties(IDictionary)

Used by the designer to add properties or remove properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.
RefreshSchema(Boolean)

Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.

Properties

  • CanConfigure

    Gets a value that indicates whether the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure* method can be called by the design host.

    public override bool CanConfigure { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the stem.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner.Configure* method can be called; otherwise, false.

  • CanRefreshSchema

      The value of the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ConnectionString* property.

    • String

      The value of the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntitySetName* property.

  • EntityTypeFilter

    Gets or sets the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter* property of the EntityDataSource control.

      The value of the stem.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.EntityTypeFilter* property.

Methods

  • Configure()

    Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.

    public override void Configure ();
  • GetView(String)

    Returns a data source view that has the specified name.

    public override System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView GetView (string viewName);

    Parameters

    • viewName
      String

      The name of the view to return.

    Returns

    • DesignerDataSourceView

      A stem.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView object with the name specified by viewName.

  • GetViewNames()

    Gets a list of available views.

    public override string[] GetViewNames ();

    Returns

    • String[]

      A collection with one element that contains the name "DefaultView".

  • Initialize(IComponent)

    Initializes the control designer and loads the specified component.

    public override void Initialize (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component);

    Parameters

    • component
      IComponent

      An IComponent object to initialize.

  • PreFilterProperties(IDictionary)

    Used by the designer to add properties or remove properties in the properties grid, or to shadow properties of the associated control.

    protected override void PreFilterProperties (System.Collections.IDictionary properties);

    Parameters

    • properties
      IDictionary

      The properties to be filtered.

    Remarks

    This member overrides PreFilterProperties.

  • RefreshSchema(Boolean)

    Refreshes the schema from the underlying data source.

    public override void RefreshSchema (bool preferSilent);

    Parameters

    • preferSilent
      Boolean

      true to suppress all data source events until the schema is refreshed.
